title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1000.14 - Dismissal of an application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1000.14 - Dismissal of an application

State Regulations

Whenever, in the absence of any genuine issue as to any
material fact, it appears that the statutory requirements for a certificate
cannot be met, the board may dismiss the application seeking such certificate
and terminate the proceeding in question upon the motion of any party or upon
its own motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
1000.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
